variation.name: Copy-of_CopyOfFromDocumentRoot
variation.description: Use xsl:copy-of to copy the root of an xml document, output to result file. [Bug 51085]

variation.name: ResultTreeFragmentWithEscapedText
variation.description: Use xsl:variable that is of type 'result tree fragment' and contains an escaped text node (via disable-output-escaping). Copy this into the result tree using xsl:copy-of and xsl:value-of. [Bug/DCR 53329]

variation.name: UseXmlnsWithEmptyStringAsDefaultNs
variation.description: Use xsl:copy-of to copy a RTF with an element whose default namespace has been set to xmlns="", when copied - this should be preserved. [Bug 71781].
